title: React Native Developer
companyName: Mobi Trade (Sarvabhishta E-Waste Management PVT LTD)
jobDescription:
We are looking for a React Native developer interested in building performant mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms. You will be responsible for architecting and building these applications, as well as coordinating with the teams responsible for other layers of the product

Job Responsibilities
  • Build pixel-perfect, smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.
  • Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.
  • Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.
  • Reach out to the open source community to encourage and help implement mission-critical software fixes React Native moves fast and often breaks things.
  • Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.
  • Transition existing React web apps to React Native.
Job Skills
  • Knowledge of functional or object-oriented programming.
  • Ability to write well-documented, clean Javascript code.
  • Familiarity with native build tools, like XCode, Gradle.
  • Understanding of REST APIs, the document request model, and offline storage.

title: Jr. Salesforce Developer
jobDescription:
• A junior Salesforce developer with 2-5 years of Salesforce development experience
  • We're looking for a smart, creative developer with diverse experience
  • You'll be expected to handle advanced tasks, including designing solutions, interfacing with services using platform events and REST architecture, writing APEX classes, optimizing flows, implementing lightning components, and providing expert-level support
  • You should possess a strong software engineering background and a solid understanding of object-oriented software principles

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, MIS, or a related field.
  • 2+ years of experience with APEX, SOQL/SOSL, and Lightning.
  • Experience integrating Salesforce with other systems using SOAP, REST, BULK, and Streaming APIs.
  • Familiarity with Aura Framework. Experience building Lightning Aura Components.
  • Proficiency in unit testing and dependency injection.
  • Proven experience in developing complex, scalable, and high-performance software systems successfully delivered to customers.
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to effectively engage with both business and technical teams.
  • Understanding of broader systems engineering concepts, including data structures, data modeling, database schemas, event-driven vs. message-driven architecture, and API integration best practices.
  • Experience with Git Version Control Systems and Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) workflows within Salesforce.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Understanding and experience in the FinTech / Financing space
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment
  • Salesforce Application Architect Certification
  • Salesforce Systems Architect Certification
  • Platform Developer II certification

title: Architect

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


  • Leading the conceptualization and design development of real estate projects, ensuring adherence to regulatory requirements and industry standards
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate sustainable design principles and innovative architectural solutions into project plans
  • Managing the production of detailed drawings, specifications, and design documentation for construction and procurement purposes
  • Overseeing the coordination and communication with external consultants, contractors, and suppliers to ensure the successful execution of architectural designs
  • Participating in site visits and inspections to monitor the progress and quality of construction activities, addressing any design-related issues as they arise
  • Providing technical expertise and guidance to junior architects and design team members, fostering a culture of learning and professional development

jobDescription:

Total Experience -5+years
Relevant Experience: 4+years in React Native
Location - Andheri (Mumbai) Work from the office
Job Responsibilities :
Understanding of cross-platform design principles.
2+ years of mobile software development experience. 1+ years of iOS and Android
development experience with React Native.
Good Experience in JavaScript, Typescript and React Native, strong familiarity
with native mobile application development either Android or iOS.
Solid understanding of mobile development concepts; APIs consumption, power
optimization, user interaction design, application security.
Coding for the mobile environment, experience integrating third-party SDKs into apps.
Application lifecycle management with both Apple App Store and Google Play Store.
Superior critical thinking, analytical, evaluation, and problem-solving skills.
Self-directed and proactive, work collaboratively with team members and independently;
thinks beyond the immediate problem.

Nice to have :
Experience using Flutter and Firebase
Experience using mobile testing frameworks and methodologies
Familiarity with Material UI (or similar)
Familiarity with UX testing and user research
